response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer reflects our commitment to finding the right buyer who appreciates the true worth of this product. We look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 950000}
